text: was a Japanese photojournalist. She was known as the country's first photojournalist. She was born in Tokyo, Japan. She was known for her pictures during the Occupation of Japan and for being active in her 100s. Sasamoto died on 15 August 2022 in Tokyo at the age of 107. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Japanese photographers Category:Japanese journalists Category:Writers from Tokyo
title: Tsuneko Sasamoto
